question:
Consider the following pairs [Caves - Location]
  1. Siju Caves - Meghalaya
  2. Kotumsar - Chattishgarh
  3. Patal Bhuvaneshwar - Uttarakhand
  4. Borra Caves - Andhra Pradesh
  5. Barabar Caves - Bihar
Which of the above is/are correctly matched?
explanation: All the above are correctly matched
